name: Parkour Legends
description:
Hi! Welcome to our first game!

This is a game made by Alexander Newman and Robert Westbury

Instructions:

Arrow keys to move, and Space to jump!

Credits:

Alexander Newmam: Drawing and Animations

Robert Westbury: Code

If you have finished the game make sure to comment your name and say you finished!

People who have finished:

Alex

Harry

Alexander

Hope you enjoy our game!
